  • trace

trace¶

Note

Memory traces are only implemented in the Stimulus-response learning and Guided associative learning mechanisms.

Specifies the decay factor of fading memory traces. The value is a number between 0 and 1. The higher value, the longer the memory trace of each stimulus stays with the agent. A low value means it fades fast. The default is 0.

The value of the parameter trace is used in the decision function.

Syntax¶

trace = v

where v is a scalar expression.

Description¶

trace = v sets the decay factor to v.

Examples¶

trace = 0.5

sets the weight for v(element1->behavior1) to 0.5, and for the remaining possible element-behavior pairs to 3.

@variables x = 0.5
trace = x + 0.1

sets the decay factor to 0.6.
